title: Business & Finance
text:
---

Security-software company McAfee is nearing a deal to sell itself to a group including private-equity firms Advent and Permira for more than $10 billion.

---

The Justice Department has opened an investigation into electric-van startup Workhorse, according to documents reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.

---

Boeing's board will add a director with safety expertise and adopt other internal measures under a proposed $237.5 million agreement to settle a shareholder lawsuit.

---

Evergrande raised more than $50 million last month by selling two of its private jets, bringing in much needed cash to help avert a default on its U.S. dollar debt.
